Text:
Thank you! I've been waiting for this. 'Lerry Jewis' might be old, corny, bitter and surly now but the man IS a legend. Without 'Lerry', no Eddie Murphy remakes! (snicker).

Anyway, subtitles here:  http://subscene.com/subtitles/method-to-the-madness-of-jerry-lewis/english/679081
Great show...Best two hours I've spend on video in awhile... I'm trying to download all his movies now. The Nutty Professor is a classic. Thank you
